poem:
**The Art of the Stealthy Tax**

In the dim corridors of policy,  
where whispers weave like smoke,  
chancellors craft their quiet art—  
a feathered touch upon your purse.  
No thundering decree, just the hush  
of an unseen tide rising slowly,  
leaving only the faintest ripple  
where your fortunes once lay calm.
